1572280.name: Isolationist Nightclub Simulator Soundtrack
1572280.description:
Did someone ask for an album that sounds like Vangelis jamming with Nine Inch Nails..?

Enter the smoky, synth-heavy, and neon-fueled world of ISOLATIONIST NIGHTCLUB SIMULATOR! This album contains music from the new game by Edwin Montgomery, featuring the driving retro club tracks accompanied by mellow ambience and minimalist piano pieces.
